snippet: Bob Bradley, the American coach of the Egyptian national soccer team, has immersed himself in Egyptian society since 74 people were killed during a league match last February.
abstract: Bob Bradley, American coach of Egyptian national soccer team, has immersed himself in Egyptian society since 74 people were killed in February 2012 during match between league rivals Al-Masry and Al-Ahly.
lead_paragraph: Bob Bradley, the American coach of the Egyptian national soccer team, has immersed himself in Egyptian society since 74 people were killed during a league match last February.

headline.seo: Bob Bradley Tries to Help Egyptian Soccer League and Fans
headline.main: Egyptian League and Fans Try to Heal With Help From an American Coach
headline.print_headline: Egyptian League and Fans Try to Heal With Help From an American Coach
